tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I visited her clinic for RCT.  I must appreciate the way she did the treatment and explained each and every small thing in detailed. 
The experience was too good.
Doctor well understood the problem and suggested appropriate treatment procedure *** **** **** ****** ***** ******* *********** ********* ******* ***** ** *** ** **********Thank you!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: By far the most amazing dentist I've come across. I am quite sensitive to dental treatments but Dr. Haritha handled it with care and patience. So far during the treatment, not once have I felt any pain or discomfort. At first, I found the treatment expensive but the kind of expertise Dr. Haritha has and the way she treats her patients, it's all worth it. Throughout the treatment, she played calm music and kept giving me breaks in between the treatments as I had a difficult treatment to do. Today I'm filled with immense gratitude for the painless treatment, kindness, and patience Dr. Haritha has shown. I hope to visit her for further treatments. I highly recommend Dr. Haritha for all kinds of dental treatments and assure you that there would be no pain in any treatment an individual would go through at her clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
It was a nice experience with Dr. Haritha Tooth Align Multispecialty dental clinic and implant center under Dr. Haritha. After reading some reviews on the practice I decided to give Dr. Haritha Dental Care a chance and trust me I was not disappointed at all. Firstly Dr. Haritha is the most friendly dentist you would ever meet. Her experience in all dental treatment is very evident in the way she explains and all. Finally, the treatment is done with a very comfortable zirconium cap. Thank you so much, Dr. The clinic is very beautiful well maintained, and hygienic. 
Would recommend it to my friends.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Visited For Conservative DentistryInvisible/Clear BracesDental Crowns
Our sincere gratitude to Dr. Haritha for handling such a complicated case with precision and perfection. Based on our experience and exposure, we don’t have any hesitation in saying that Dr. Haritha is one of the best with exceptional skills in the field of Dentistry!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Implant related Dentures,Teeth Replacement with Implants in three days,
review: All reviews on both Practo and Google are true to the word. I went purely by relying on reviews. Very approachable doctor with, a clear explanation, and lightning speed procedure. For the implant, got the tooth exactly in 3 days as committed by the Doctor. My total time spent on both days put together did not exceed 1.5 hours including the waiting period. Simply awesome. Highly Recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had severe tooth pain for a couple of weeks and consulted Dr Haritha. She explained the problem very clearly and informed me to go for Root Canal treatment. The Dr said it would be 2-3 sittings. The first sitting was done on Nov.24.2023. The Dr has a lot of patience and skilled as well. Happy for the 1st sitting. She was available over the phone for any support. I recommend Dr Haritha. Budget-friendly as well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My mom had missing teeth. And she is very anxious to go to the dentist. Got a reference from one of our friends we consulted Dr Haritha. She made my mom comfortable in the entire process. It's 3months now and my mom is comfortable with 12 caps done by Dr. The Doctor used advanced technology during treatment.  Thank u Dr Haritha.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,

The follow-up after the treatment was appreciable Thank you, Doctor. I recommend Dr. Haritha for RCT. The ambiance was good and Hygienic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Haritha mam is very professional and have lots of patience. She treated us with utmost care and made sure we are very comfortable throughout the treatment process. She also explained us all the minute details of the issue.Would definitely recommend her.

I already had filled teeth of lower and one side of upper. She was supposed to fill only one side of top. During filling time, she didn’t allow me to see what she was doing. Then charge me 6 teeth in which she charged for already filled one. Not ready to share bill also for charging ₹9,600/-. * ***** *** ****** ** *** ***** ** ********* **** *** ****** * ****
reply_text: Sir we clearly explained you by showing your cavities before filling them. You had cavities on other side also. We didn't charge you for already filled cavities. Bills are system generated check your mail ID.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am a veteran soldier from Indian Air Force, served the nation for long 38 years, came across many doctors but a doctor like Gopathi Haritha is seldom found, lot of patience, making the patient comfortable n truly rendering service with smile. She explains every issue very deeply n helping to understand. Absolutely never in a hurry, very determined n always in touch with the patient. This attitude will help her to achieve new heights. Wish her all success in future endeavours. God bless.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
A very understanding, caring and patient doctor.

I consulted Dr Haritha for tooth pain.

She patiently diagnosed my issue and also took the time to educate me on the reason behind the issue, which I really appreciated.

She is also skilled in making patients feel comfortable.

All in all, it was a very pleasant experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had been for a wisdom tooth extraction. The condition of the tooth decay was high and the position of the tooth was not proper and risky. But good that the experience of the doctor and the support, things went well without a worry. Ample knowledge was provided so that I understand the treatment. Also good followup from the friendly doctor lead to a successful treatment. I would recommend this clinic.
